item.description:
The next New England United meeting will be in Boston on Saturday, August 1, to include reports from the National Assembly conference in Pittsburgh, actions being planned for the fall, and the NEU conference in November.

This will also be the SECOND ANNIVERSARY MEETING of New England United and a birthday cake will be served. A proposed agenda approved by the Regional committee can be found below. This is an important meeting as we gear up for the fall actions that are being planned.

Proposed agenda:
1:00 Jeff Klein of Dorchester People for Peace will report back on the Viva Palestina humanitarian aid convoy which reached Gaza on July 15.

1:45 Break and NEU Birthday Cake

2:00 NEU Business Meeting

  • Intros (5 min) -- We expect attendance from at least 4 states in New England
  • National Assembly report back (20 min) -- A national antiwar conference achieved unity on dates for fall actions.
  • Oct. 17/18 (60 min) -- A Boston UJP Initiated demonstration will be proposed as a region wide action.
  • G-20 (20 min) -- An antiwar presence is planned for Pittsburgh when the worldâ€™s media will be on hand for the international G20 meeting.
  • Regional conference (20 min) -- There is a thirst for education on Afghanistan, Pakistan, Iran, and so on. Can we provide some?
  • Next meeting (5 min)


4:10 Working Group meetings
item.name: Regional Antiwar Meeting
